Headline: Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running with delays due to a previous interlocking problem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with delays due to a previous interlocking problem.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #43 43rd Temporary Reroute near 43rd/Michigan
ShortDescription: 43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 43rd/Michigan, due to street blockage near 43rd/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 43rd/Michigan, due to street blockage near 43rd/Michigan.

Westbound buses will operate via 43rd, Michigan, 45th, Wabash, 43rd and over regular route.

Eastbound buses will operate via 43rd, Wabash, 45th, Indiana, 43rd and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.
